attachments.fallback: GitHub: improve diff by using lua if available by prabirshrestha · Pull Request #821 · prabirshrestha/vim-lsp
attachments.title: improve diff by using lua if available by prabirshrestha · Pull Request #821 · prabirshrestha/vim-lsp
attachments.text: Port of natebosch/vim-lsc#282 to vim-lsp. It implements bottleneck in lua. If lua is not supported it will fallback to vimscript implementation. Refer to natebosch/vim-lsc#273 for more info.
